snippet: Citing the potential cost of fighting and losing a government lawsuit, Macmillan agreed to terms similar to those imposed on other major publishers who had settled.
abstract: Citing the potential cost of fighting and losing a government lawsuit, Macmillan agreed to terms similar to those imposed on other major publishers who had settled.

headline.main: Macmillan Will Settle a Lawsuit on E-Books
headline.print_headline:
Macmillan Will Settle
A Lawsuit
On E-Books
